results.scores_desc: First, put your highest ability score in Strength, followed by Constitution.
First, Charisma should be your highest ability score, followed by Dexterity.
First, Wisdom should be your highest ability score, followed by Strength or Constitution.
results.scores: First Wisdom. Second Strength or Constitution.

results.scores_desc: First, Wisdom should be your highest ability score, followed by Constitution.

First, make Strength or Dexterity your highest ability score, depending on whether you want to focus on melee weapons or on archery (or finesse weapons). Your next-highest score should be Constitution, or Intelligence if you plan to adopt the Eldritch Knight martial archetype.
results.scores: First Strength or Dexterity. Second Constitution or Intelligence.

results.scores_desc: First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom.
First, Strength should be your highest ability score, followed by Charisma.
First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.)

First. Dexterity should be your highest ability score. Make Intelligence your next-highest if you want to excel at Investigation or plan to take up the Arcane Trickster archetype. Choose Charisma instead if you plan to emphasize deception and social interaction.
First, Charisma should be your highest ability score, followed by Constitution,
First, Charisma should be your highest ability score, followed by Constitution.
First, Intelligence should be your highest ability score, followed by Constitution or Dexterity. If you plan to join the School of Enchantment, make Charisma your next-best score.
results.scores: First Intelligence. Second Constitution or Dexterity.
